field.filter: SELECT IPAddress AS ip WHERE ip.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Domain AS d WHERE d.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPUsage AS i WHERE i.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT FunctionalCI AS ci WHERE ci.org_id = :this->org_id AND ci.finalclass = :this->ciclass
SELECT IPv4Block AS b WHERE b.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Subnet AS s WHERE s.block_id = :this->block_id AND s.org_id = :this->org_id AND s.mask NOT IN ('255.255.255.254', '255.255.255.255')
SELECT IPv4Range AS r WHERE r.subnet_id = :this->subnet_id AND r.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Location AS l WHERE l.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv6Block AS b WHERE b.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv6Subnet AS s WHERE s.block_id = :this->block_id AND s.org_id = :this->org_id AND s.mask NOT IN ('127', '128')
SELECT IPv6Range AS r WHERE r.subnet_id = :this->subnet_id AND r.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Location AS l WHERE l.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Domain AS d WHERE d.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPUsage WHERE org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPSubnet AS s WHERE s.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Block AS b WHERE b.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Location AS l WHERE l.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv6Block AS b WHERE b.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Location AS l WHERE l.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Location AS l JOIN lnkIPSubnetToLocation AS sl ON sl.location_id=l.id JOIN IPSubnet AS s ON sl.ipsubnet_id=s.id WHERE s.id = :this->subnet_id
SELECT Location AS l WHERE l.org_id = :this->org_id

dashlet.title: UI:IPRequestManagement:Overview:RequestByType-last-14-days
dashlet.query: SELECT IPRequest WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) < start_date

dashlet.title: UI:IPRequestManagement:Overview:Last-14-days
dashlet.query: SELECT IPRequest WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) < start_date

dashlet.title: UI:IPRequestManagement:Overview:OpenRequestByStatus
dashlet.query: SELECT IPRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

dashlet.title: UI:IPRequestManagement:Overview:OpenRequestByAgent
dashlet.query: SELECT IPRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

dashlet.title: UI:IPRequestManagement:Overview:OpenRequestByType
dashlet.query: SELECT IPRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

dashlet.title: UI:IPRequestManagement:Overview:OpenRequestByCustomer
dashlet.query: SELECT IPRequest WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

menu.oql: SELECT IPRequest WHERE agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed")

dashlet.title: Menu:IPRequestManagement:MyOpenRequests
dashlet.query: SELECT IPRequest AS r WHERE r.agent_id = :current_contact_id AND r.status NOT IN ("resolved", "closed")

profile.name: IP Portal user
profile.description: Has the rights to access the IP portal. People having this profile will not be allowed to access the standard application, they will be automatically redirected to the default portal.

profile.name: IP Portal Automation user
profile.description: Is elligible to have its IP requests automatically processed. Must be used in conjunction with "IP Portal user" profile.
